faq.question: What motivates you?
faq.answer: My curiosity is unsatiatable. I love learning as much as I can with and from passionate people and giving back to my community in any way that I can.

faq.question: What are some of your hobbies?
faq.answer: Strategy and board games, building tools and legos, and exploring new restaurants or areas are things I love doing just to name a few!

faq.question: What sparked your interest in data science/technology?
faq.answer: I have always had an interest in how the world works and I came to the realization at a young age that data and experinces drive a lot of the decisions that have been made today. Using technology and data science as a tool, we can leverage these to make a bigger impact for humanity and the world.

faq.question: What’s the most interesting place you’ve traveled to?
faq.answer: I travelled to Japan as a part of a college graduation trip and enaging in the culture as well as being able to stretch my Japanese speaking legs was amazing. The food, atmosphere, people, and animals were all wonderful and I am excited to visit there again.

faq.question: If you weren’t working in tech, what would you be doing?
faq.answer: If you have ever seen videos of people living in the woods building tools and houses from scratch, that is where I would be.

faq.question: Dogs or Cats?
faq.answer: While I think both have their perks, I am decidely a dog person.
